description: Ms. codex. Title supplied by cataloger. Dark cream glazed paper with laid lines visible. Foliation in pencil using Western numerals. According to the colophons, text 1 was copied in Iṣfahān in Rajab 1022 (fol. 29a), and text 3 in 1022 (fol. 64a).
author: ʻĀmilī, Bahāʼ al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Ḥusayn, 1547-1621
contents: 1. 1b-29a: al-Ithnā ʻasharīyah al-ṣawmīyah / Bahāʼ al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Ḥusayn al-ʻĀmilī.
4. 33b-38b: Ḥall laṭīf li-ʻibārah muʻḍilah fī Qawāʻid al-aḥkām / Bahāʼ al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Ḥusayn al-ʻĀmilī.
6. 41a-64a: Risālah fī tisʻ masāʼil mimmā yataʻallaqu bi-al-ṣalāh / Ḥusayn ibn ʻAbd al-Ṣamad al-Ḥārithī al-ʻĀmilī.
8. 65b-68b: al-Wajīzah / Bahāʼ al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Ḥusayn al-ʻĀmilī.
9. 69b-73a: [Answers to three questions on al-Bayḍawī's and al-Ṭabarsī's commentaries of some Qurʼanic verses].
